segments.text: Houston restaurant . Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . When do you start severing dinner ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We open at 6:00 and take last orders at 10 :: 30 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that's fine . So I don't think it necessary for us to make a reservation . We will be there at 9:30 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . We are looking forward to your coming .
segments.speaker: S1
